english.segment1: No one moves me like you. No one loves me like you. No one cares like you do. No one
english.segment2: I just want to be. Where you want me to be. I just want to stay with you
english.segment3: I love you. I need you. I praise you. I love you (Jesus)
english.segment4: No one knows me like oyu. No one fills me like oyu. No one holds like you do. No one
english.segment5: I love you. I bless you. I thank you. I love you (Jesus)
english.segment6: I just want to be. Where you want me to be. I just want to say. What you want me to say. I just want to be. Who you want me to be. I just want your way in me.
